title: The Village formal calligraphic connected script
content:
can anyone help me with this font

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503105659im_/http:/typophile.com/files/the%20village_3703.jpg)
author: elite_signs

comments.content: Looks like it is based on [ITC Edwardian Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503105659/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/itc/itc_edwardian_script_std_regular/&sample_text=The%20Village&sample_size=96&acs_ss=14) with the Swash T (scroll down).
thanks!! that helped me out more than I can say.
